title: Best of the Program | Guests: Vivek Ramaswamy & Eric July | 7/20/22
description:
Glenn explains the ambiguity of PEADs, what they are, how they're enacted, and the powers they grant. The Democrats were terrified of President Trump abusing national emergencies, but that fear has disappeared under Biden. Author of 'Nation of Victims' Vivek Ramaswamy joins to explain the downfall of BlackRock's profit and if ESG or the economy is to blame. BlazeTV Contributor and Founder of Rippaverse Comics Eric July joins to share what led him to launch his own comic book company.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
